title: [Health] Exposure to sun, heat can exacerbate symptoms of mental disorders. Research found clear trends connecting high heat, humidity with increased emergency admissions due to mental disorders, especially among patients suffering symptoms linked to psychoactive substance use, mood disorders

[Medicine] Nine in ten people do not get a good nightâ€™s sleep, according to research presented at ESC Congress 2022. The study found that suboptimal sleep was associated with a higher likelihood of heart disease and stroke.
